attributes.action: Politicians should not allowed to attend rememberence day parade at the cenotaph
attributes.background: The continued neglect and persecution of our forces for doing a job they would not have the bottle to do, we should honor our dead, not them, name a war politicians have stopped, can name you a hundred they started

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the Royal British Legion and not the UK Government or Parliament.
